name: Introduction to Earth Science
description: This course introduces students to the basic concepts and processes in Earth Science, including geology, oceanography, meteorology, and astronomy.

name: Introduction to Oceanography
description: This course introduces students to the scientific study of the ocean, including the physical, chemical, and biological aspects of the marine environment.

name: Marine Geology and Geophysics
description: This course is an introduction to the geology and geophysics of the ocean, with emphasis on the physical oceanography of the seafloor.

name: Marine Chemistry
description: This course focuses on the chemical and biochemical processes and cycles in the ocean, the interactions between the ocean and the atmosphere, and the impact of human activities on the marine environment.

name: Marine Biology
description: This course is an introduction to the biology of the ocean, including the study of the diversity of marine organisms, their interactions with each other and the environment, and their role in the ocean food web.
